project_overview.title: Interactive Multi-Theme Portfolio Website
project_overview.description: Build a highly interactive, visually stunning portfolio website for an Industrial Engineering student specializing in AI and Data Science, who is also a skilled graphic designer. The portfolio must seamlessly blend technical sophistication with creative design excellence.

core_technologies.frontend: React.js with TypeScript for type safety and component reusability
core_technologies.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom animations and Framer Motion for interactions
core_technologies.routing: React Router for seamless navigation between sections
core_technologies.state_management: React Context API for theme switching and data management
core_technologies.animations: Framer Motion for drag interactions and smooth animations
core_technologies.build_tool: Vite for fast development and optimized production builds
core_technologies.image_handling: Vite's import.meta.glob for dynamic image loading

coding_guidelines.principle: Write clean, modular, and reusable components
Follow React best practices and hooks patterns
Optimize for performance with lazy loading and code splitting
Use Tailwind CSS for consistent styling with dynamic inline styles for theme switching
Handle drag interactions with Framer Motion using offset-based positioning
Maintain state for positions, rotations, and selections across tool switches
Use underscore prefix for intentionally unused state variables

issue.problem: Framer Motion drag with delta accumulation causes incorrect positioning
issue.solution: Use info.offset instead of info.delta, and track dragStartPos separately

issue.problem: Conditional animate prop conflicts with drag behavior
issue.solution: Always apply position from state in animate prop, never conditionally

success_criteria.criterion: Visitor engagement: Average session time > 2 minutes
Mobile responsiveness: Perfect rendering on all screen sizes
Loading performance: First contentful paint < 2 seconds
Impression: "Wow factor" that makes visitors remember the portfolio
